game.s_dis: Level Devil 2 is the sequel to the infamous troll-platformer, featuring even deadlier traps, unpredictable levels, and a 2-player mode for double the chaos.
game.l_dis:
Level Devil 2 â€“ Twice the Traps, Twice the Trolls

Level Devil 2 builds on the originalâ€™s chaotic formula, delivering even more unexpected hazards, trickier platforming, and troll-level design. Your task remains simpleâ€”collect the key and reach the exit doorâ€”but this time, the traps are smarter, faster, and nastier than ever.

What is Level Devil 2?

Level Devil 2 is a rage-inducing 2D platformer where every jump could trigger spikes, holes, or collapsing floors. Unlike standard platformers, the game constantly trolls players with unpredictable hazards, ensuring no two runs feel the same. This sequel also introduces a fun 2-player local mode, letting you and a friend tackle the madnessâ€”or sabotage each other!

How to Play Level Devil 2?

  • Move & Jump: Use WASD or arrow keys to run and jump.
  • Grab Keys: Each level requires you to find the key before the exit can be unlocked.
  • Dodge Chaos: Expect spikes, sudden pits, falling ceilings, and hidden troll traps at every turn.
  • Survive Together: In 2-player mode, coordinateâ€”or competeâ€”for survival.

Why Play Level Devil 2 Unblocked?

Level Devil 2 Unblocked lets you dive straight into the madness without restrictions. Whether solo or with a friend, itâ€™s perfect for school, work, or home when you want quick troll-filled fun right in your browser.

Key Features

  • Sequel Chaos: More traps, more hazards, and more troll-level design.
  • Unpredictable Gameplay: No two runs are the same with hidden surprises everywhere.
  • 2-Player Local Mode: Play with a friend for teamworkâ€”or betrayal.
  • Classic Platform Controls: Simple to pick up, impossible to master.
  • Browser Fun: Play instantly online, no downloads needed.

Will You Beat the Devil Again?
